monster.name: Otherworldly Familiar

ac.special: 10 + the level of the spell (natural armor) + 2 (land and water only)

hp.special: 2 + 2 for each spell level above 1st (the familiar has a number of Hit Dice [d4s] equal to the level of the spell)

languages: telepathy 120ft. (only between you and the familiar)

trait.name: Amphibious (Water only)
entries: The familiar can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Extradimensional Escape (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the familiar would drop to 0 hit points, it instead drops to 1 hit point and vanishes into an extradimensional space, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.  It remains there for 1 hour or until you summon it as a Magic action, and then it appears in your space.

trait.name: Flyby (Air only)
entries: The familiar does not provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The familiar has advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) checks.

action.name: Otherworldly Scratch
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  {@h} {@damage 1 + summonSpellLevel} radiant damage (Celestial), psychic damage (Fey), or necrotic damage (Fiend).

reaction.name: Deliver Spell
entries: When you cast a spell with a range of touch, the familiar can deliver the spell with its touch.  To do so, the familiar must be within 120 feet of you.

monster.name: Otherworldly Steed

ac.special: 10 + the level of the spell (natural armor); can wear barding armor

hp.special: 5 + 10 for each spell level above 2nd (the steed has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the level of the spell)

languages: telepathy 1 mile (only between you and the steed)

trait.name: Amphibious (special)
entries: If you summon your steed with the 20 ft walking speed & 60 ft swim speed option, then the steed can breathe air and water, and it can share these traits with you if summoned with a 3rd level spell or higher.

trait.name: Life Bond
entries: When you regain hit points from a spell of 1st level or higher, the steed regains the same number of hit points if you are within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Mounted Spells
entries: You can make any spell you cast that targets only you also target your steed if you are within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Otherworldly Maul
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  {@h} {@damage 1d8 + summonSpellLevel} radiant damage (Celestial), psychic damage (Fey), or necrotic damage (Fiend).

bonus.name: Fey Step (Fey only, PB/Long Rest)
entries: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 30 feet away.

bonus.name: Fell Glare (Fiend only, PB/Long Rest)
entries: The steed's eyes gleam with fiendish light as it targets one creature it can perceive up to 60 feet away.  The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} of the steed until the end of the steed's next turn.

bonus.name: Healing Touch (Celestial only, PB/Long Rest)
entries: The steed touches another creature and restores a number of hit points equal to 2d6 + the spell's level.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 20 (Air only) or 30 (Land and Water only) + 5 for each spell level above 2nd (the beast has a number of hit die [d6s] equal to your spell level)

trait.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
entries: The beast can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Flyby (Air Only)
entries: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
entries: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Alter Size
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the size of the best can be Medium and its Hit Die become d8s.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the size of the beast can be Large and its Hit Die become d10s.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the size of the beast can be Huge and its Hit Die become d12s.

trait.name: Bestial Swiftness
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, all the Speed of the beast is increased by 10 feet.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, all the Speed of the beast is increased by 30 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} force damage.

ac.special: 8 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 40 + 15 for each level of the spell above 2nd (the ooze has a number of hit die [d8s] equal to your spell level)

trait.name: Adhesive (Adhesive Only)
entries: The ooze adheres to anything that touches it or it hits with a pseudopod.  A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the ooze is also grappled by it (escape DC equals your spell save DC)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Form (Corrosive Only)
entries: A creature that touches the ooze or hits it with a melee attackw within 5 feet of it takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Psuedopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} acid damage.  For each size category above Medium, the pseudopod reach increases by 5ft. (Expansive only)

bonus.name: Shift Size (Expansive Only)
entries: The ooze's size increases or decreases by one size category.  The ooze can become Tiny, buy no smaller than one foot in height, width, and length.  Alternatively, the ooze can become no larger than Large via this bonus action, unless it was summoned with a spell slot of 5th level or higher.   Then the ooze can become no larger than Huge via this bonus action.

monster.name: Undead Creature

hp.special: 15 (the undead has a number of Hit Die [d8s] equal to your spell level

languages: understands the languages it knew in life but cannot speak

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the undead to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit.  On a success, the undead drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Undead Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature.  {@h}{@damage 1d4 + PB} bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (your choice on creation)

action.name: Undead Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + PB} necrotic damage.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor) + 2 (Bramblejack Only)

hp.special: 30 + 10 for each spell level above 3rd (the plan has a number of Hit Die [d8s] equal to your spell level)

trait.name: Brambles (Bramblejack Only)
entries: At the start of its turn, the plant deals 4 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage to any creature grappling it, or within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Choking Poof (Pollenpoof Only)
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the plant must succeed a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or become {@condition poisoned}.  While poisoned in this way, they are unable to speak even preventing them from performing the verbal component of spells.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the botani remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a native plant.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The plant makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Constricting Vines (Vinetrap Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target.  {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level} magical bludgeoning damage, and a Large or smaller target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC equals your spell save DC).  Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the plant cannot constrict another target.

action.name: Pollen Shot (Pollenpoof Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 3 + the spell's level} poison damage plus 1d4 magical piercing damage.

action.name: Whomp (Bramblejack Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + the spell's level} magical bludgeoning damage.

hp.special: 35 + 10 for each spell level above 3rd (the fey has a number of Hit Die [d6s] equal to your spell level)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Feyblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage {@damage + 1d6} force damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step
entries: The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

items.name: Fuming
items.entry: The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

items.name: Mirthful
items.entry: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is {@condition charmed} by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

items.name: Tricksy
items.entry: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 35 + 15 for each spell level above 3rd (the shadow has a number of Hit Die [d8s] equal to your spell level)

trait.name: Dark's Embrace (Fear Only)
entries: When the spirit deals damage to a creature they must make an Intelligence saving throw against your spell save DC.  Unless they succeed, the creature is unable to see anything farther than 5 feet away until the start of your next turn.  If the creature is {@condition frightened} while under this effect then they treat this darkness as the source of their fear.

trait.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
entries: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against {@condition frightened} creatures.

trait.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by a number of feet equal to 5 times your proficiency bonus until the start of that creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Chilling Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} cold damage.

action.name: Dreadful Scream (PB/Day)
entries: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.

monster.name: Undead Spirit

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 30 (Ghostly and Putrid only) or 20 (Skeletal only) + 10 for each spell level above 3rd (the undead has a number of Hit Die [d8s] equal to your spell level)

languages: Maze Cant, understands the languages you speak

trait.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes {@damage 1d10} force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

trait.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} necrotic damage.

action.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} magical slashing damage. If the target is {@condition poisoned}, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} psychic damage.

action.name: Claws (Slaad Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} magical slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

action.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} psychic damage.

trait.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} force damage.

entries: When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the construct moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)

action.name: Multiattack

bnous.name: Blazing Speed (Fire only)
entries: The elemental can {@action Dash} as a bonus action as long as it is not in water.

bnous.name: Slip Stream (Water only)
entries: The elemental can {@action Dash} as a bonus action as long as it is in or on water.

trait.name: Divine Awareness (Venerator only)
entries: The celestial spirit knows if it hears a lie.

trait.name: Holy Bulwark (Defender Only)

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The celestial spirit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Radiant Strike (Venerator and Defender Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} radiant damage, and the celestial (Defender only) :can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points.

action.name: Healing Touch (PB/Day)
entries: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d6 + summonSpellLevel}.

hp.special: 50 + 10 for each spell level above 5th (the dragon has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the level of the spell)

trait.name: Shared Resistances (Metallic Only)
entries: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

trait.name: Chromatic Potency (Chromatic Only)
entries: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances.  you and the dragon ignore other creatures' resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

A creature takes {@damage 2d6} damage of a type this dragon has resistance to (your choice) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Irrepressible Dance
entries: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Force-Empowered Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + PB} force damage.

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The defender can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

action.name: Force-Empowered Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 2 + PB} force damage.

action.name: Repair (PB/Day)

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
entries: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

trait.name: Dampen Harm
entries: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make any saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails.  It cannot use this trait if it is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + PB} force damage.

reaction.name: Channel Magic
entries: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.
